Ability: Snowglobe Shake (Guaranteed).
Sends a cool, soothing breeze to all players on the server. This gives the same buff as the "Snowflake" item, which grants x1.25 Capacity and other minor boosts for 20s. Duration stacks up to 15 minutes, and the boosts increase with each stack.
